title: ARRL Amateur Radio Technician Class Training Course  H.264.mp4
description:
ARRL Technician Class Ham Radio License Training Video 

Course
4th edition edition (2003)

The ARRL Technician Class Video Course includes everything 
you need to earn your Amateur Radio license. See and hear 
just how much fun amateur radio is! Understand and 
remember expert advice and information. Pass your license 
examination! Thousands of hams have used ARRL video 
courses with astounding success. They're the fast, easy , fun 
way to high scoring test results! The videos include lively 
video instruction, presented in bite-sized segments, colorful 
graphics, animation & close up video.

- Getting the Most Out of Your Course
- The Magic of Radio
- Types of Emissions
- Electrical Principles
- Practical Electronics
- Operating Considerations
- Antennas and Feed Lines
- Repeaters
- Safety Practices
- RF Radiation Safety
- FCC Regulations
- Frequency Privileges
- Repeater, RTTY and Packet Rules
- Test Taking Hints
